faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.text: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about our product.

features.name: features
features.title: Unlock Unlimited Possibilities with Pictoria AI
features.text: Our platform offers a wide range of features designed to enhance your image creation experience. From easy-to-use editing tools to powerful AI-powered image generation, we have everything you need to bring your ideas to life.

hero.title2: Transform your photos with the power of AI
hero.title3: From LinkedIn headshots to Instagram influencer photos, Pictoria AI's state-of-the-art technology ensures you always look your best. Create, edit, and generate images effortlessly.

price.name: price
price.title1: Choose the plan that fits your needs
price.title2: Choose an offordable plan that is packed with the best features for engaging your audience,createing customer loyalty and driving sales. engaging your

footer.title1: Image AI Inc. All rights reserved.

review.title3: Discover why thousands are choosing Pictoria AI for effortless,high-quality photo generation, from LinkedIn headshots to vibrant social media content.

ready.title2: Join thousands of users who are already creating amazing AI-generated images.

settings.value1: please select the gender of the images
settings.info10: • Different expressions, clothing, backgrounds with good lighting
settings.info11: • Images to be in 1:1 resolution (1048x1048 or higher)
settings.info12: • Use images of similar age group (ideally within past few months)
settings.info14: Upload a zip file containing your training images (max 45MB)

settings.name: Settings
settings.modelInfo: You can select any model from the dropdown menu.
settings.aspectRatioInfo: Aspect ratio for the genearted image.
settings.numOfOutputsInfo: Total number of output images to generate.
settings.numInferenceStepsInfo: Number of denoising steps. Recommended range is 28-50 for dev model and 1-4 for schnell model.
settings.outputQualityInfo: Quality when sabing the output image. from 0 to 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality.

formSchema.guidanceMin: guidance of outputs should be atleast 1.
formSchema.guidanceMax: guidance of outputs must be les then 10.
formSchema.numOutputsMin: Number of outputs should be atleast 1.
formSchema.numOutputsMax: Number of outputs must be les then 4.
formSchema.numInferenceStepsMin: Number of inference steps should be atleast 1.
formSchema.numInferenceStepsMax: Number of inference steps must be les then or equal to 50.
formSchema.outputQualityMin: Output quality of outputs should be atleast 1.
formSchema.outputQualityMax: Output quality of outputs must be les then 100.
